title: Live and Learn
author: Mahatma Gandhi
challenge: Live as if you were to die tomorrow; learn as if you were to live forever.

title: The Strong and Weak
author: Mahatma Gandhi
challenge: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.

title: Happiness
author: Mahatma Gandhi
challenge: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.

title: Eye for an eye
author: Mahatma Gandhi
challenge: An eye for an eye only ends up making the whole world blind.

title: Winning
author: Mahatma Gandhi
challenge: First they ignore you, then they laugh at you, then they fight you, then you win.

title: Find yourslef
author: Mahatma Gandhi
challenge: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.

title: Change
author: Mahatma Gandhi
challenge: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.

title: Faith in Humanity
author: Mahatma Gandhi
challenge: You must not lose faith in humanity. Humanity is an ocean; if a few drops of the ocean are dirty, the ocean does not become dirty.

title: Strength
author: Mahatma Gandhi
challenge: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.

title: Nobody can hurt me
author: Mahatma Gandhi
challenge: Nobody can hurt me without my permission.

title: The Universe
author: Albert Einstein
challenge: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.

title: Beautiful things
author: Albert Einstein
challenge: The most beautiful thing we can experience is the mysterious. It is the source of all true art and science.

title: If you can't explain it
author: Albert Einstein
challenge: If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough.

title: Logic and Imagination
author: Albert Einstein
challenge: Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere.

title: Insanity
author: Albert Einstein
challenge: Insanity: doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results.

title: Miracles
author: Albert Einstein
challenge: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.

title: Great spirits
author: Albert Einstein
challenge: Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds.

title: Everything
author: Albert Einstein
challenge: Everything should be made as simple as possible, but not simpler.

title: What is Reality
author: Albert Einstein
challenge: Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one.

title: Success
author: Winston Churchill
challenge: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.

title: Going through Hell
author: Winston Churchill
challenge: If you're going through hell, keep going.

title: Stand Up
author: Winston Churchill
challenge: You have enemies? Good. That means you've stood up for something, sometime in your life.

title: Courage
author: Winston Churchill
challenge: Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak. Courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen

title: Success is not final
author: Winston Churchill
challenge: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

title: Make a living
author: Winston Churchill
challenge: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.

title: Change Often
author: Winston Churchill
challenge: To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.

title: Greatness
author: Winston Churchill
challenge: The price of greatness is responsibility.

title: History
author: Winston Churchill
challenge: History will be kind to me for I intend to write it.

title: Attitude
author: Winston Churchill
challenge: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
